original_text: and when they had called in the apostles, they beat them and charged them not to speak in the name of Jesus, and let them go.
korean_text: 그들이 옳게 여겨 사도들을 불러들여 채찍질하며 예수의 이름으로 말하는 것을 금하고 놓으니

sentences.original_text: and when they had called in the apostles
and charged them not to speak in the name of Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 예수의 이름으로 말하지 말라고 명했습니다
